item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】FLAC - Justin Timberlake - Studio Albums Discography | FLAC 16-bit, 44.1KHz, CD
item.description:
I ripped all of these using Exact Audio Copy, verified them via Spek and AudioTester, optimized metadata using MP3tag, and checked for SBEs and encode errors using Trader's Little Helper. Most of these were sourced directly from Justin Timberlake's CDs (where available) and includes country-exclusive and store-exclusive bonus tracks. I tried to incorporate them to their respective albums as best as possible, especially when the tracklists tend to overlap.
​

​
Justified (2002)
  1. Señorita
  2. Like I Love You (feat. Clipse)
  3. (Oh No) What You Got
  4. Take It from Here
  5. Cry Me a River
  6. Rock Your Body
  7. Nothin' Else
  8. Last Night
  9. Still on My Brain
  10. (And She Said) Take Me Now [feat. Janet Jackson]
  11. Right for Me (feat. Bubba Sparxxx)
  12. Let's Take a Ride
  13. Never Again
  14. Worthy Of (Australian Bonus Track)
  15. Why, When, How (Korean Bonus Track)
  16. I'm Lovin' It (Justified: The Videos Bonus Track)
Disclaimer: Track #15 and #16 are currently unavailable. I'm ripping them from their parent disc soon.

Download:

FutureSex/LoveSounds (2006)
  1. FutureSex/LoveSound
  2. SexyBack (feat. Timbaland)
  3. Sexy Ladies / Let Me Talk to You (Prelude)
  4. My Love (feat. T.I.)
  5. LoveStoned / I Think She Knows (Interlude)
  6. What Goes Around... / ...Comes Around (Interlude)
  7. Chop Me Up (feat. Timbaland and Three 6 Mafia)
  8. Damn Girl (feat. will.i.am)
  9. Summer Love / Set the Mood (Prelude)
  10. Until the End of Time
  11. Losing My Way
  12. (Another Song) All Over Again
  13. Pose (feat. Snoop Dogg) [UK Bonus Track]
  14. Boutique in Heaven (iTunes Pre-Order Bonus Track)
Disclaimer: "Boutique in Heaven" was sourced from the "What Goes Around... Comes Around" CD single, as the existing iTunes file remains in a lossy M4A format.
